attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I enjoy meeting new people and animals and making friends over a pint of beer. Liqueur makes loose lips and it's easier to ask for clues about the fountain of youth.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: There is beauty all around. In the stars, in a map or a pretty smile

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I want to discover the secret to eternal life

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I enjoy the libations of life, a little too much.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MTDz5hyxJZwGNcGMy7Q_description
attribs.current:
Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of hit points equal to your paladin level × 5.
As an action, you can touch a creature and draw power from the pool to restore a number of hit points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in your pool.
Alternatively, you can expend 5 hit points from your pool of healing to cure the target of one disease or neutralize one poison affecting it. You can cure multiple diseases and neutralize multiple poisons with a single use of Lay on Hands, expending hit points separately for each one.
This feature has no effect on undead and constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MTDz5i-X2qZdd68qXHK_description
attribs.current:
The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor, and powerful good rings like heavenly music in your ears. As an action, you can open your awareness to detect such forces. Until the end of your next turn, you know the location of any celestia⁠l, fiend, or undead within 60 feet of you that is not behind total cover. You know the type (celestial, fiend, or undead) of any being whose presence you sense, but not its identity (the vampi⁠re Count Strahd von Zarovich, for instance). Within the same radius, you also detect the presence of any place or object that has been consecrated or desecrated, as with the hallow spell.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier. When you finish a long rest, you regain all expended uses.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MTDz5i0xG1IpW1XpHgL_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MTDz5i0xG1IpW1XpHgM_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i2ZFhm2FIu43mg_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Alternate Damage: 1d10, Alternate Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i2ZFhm2FIu43mh_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i2ZFhm2FIu43mi_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i2ZFhm2FIu43mj_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Includes:

• a backpack

• a blanket

• 10 candles

• a tinderbox

• an alms box

• 2 blocks of incense

• a censer

• vestments

• 2 days of rations

• a waterskin.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i34LZcs8UtYLFm_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i34LZcs8UtYLFr_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i4A0Iboi7KDkPK_itemcontent
attribs.current: For 1 hour, a candle sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i4A0Iboi7KDkPL_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i4A0Iboi7KDkPM_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MTDz5i4A0Iboi7KDkPN_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVUH9lYRCXFOmksNaqh_description
attribs.current: Starting at 2nd level, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon’s damage. The extra damage is 2d8 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus 1d8 for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of 5d8. The damage increases by 1d8 if the target is an undead or a fiend, to a maximum of 6d8.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVUH9lb5hj6revRN44f_description
attribs.current: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9ldtoLVShnKZvlU_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9ldtoLVShnKZvlU_spelldescription
attribs.current: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn’t understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it. Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the GM determines how the target behaves. If the target can’t follow your command, the spell ends. Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you. Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn. Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means. Grovel. The target falls prone and then ends its turn. Halt. The target doesn’t move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9ldtoLVShnKZvlU_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9ldtoLVShnKZvlV_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9ldtoLVShnKZvlV_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9lehgIIelijof64_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you. You also identify the kind of poison, poisonous creature, or disease in each case. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9lehgIIelijof65_spelldescription
attribs.current: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9lehgIIelijof65_spelltarget
attribs.current: A 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9lfM4WzZ0ERDYCQ_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9lfM4WzZ0ERDYCQ_spelldescription
attribs.current: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVUH9lfM4WzZ0ERDYCQ_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice within range
